commit message:
Product Flavors: dev and beta with different application identifiers.
Application title depends on product flavor.
Package name 'com.xabber.androiddev' renamed to 'com.xabber.android'

Chat clickable links fix.
Problem was in conflict with ViewPager finishUpdate method. Need testing if some things become worse.
Html.fromHtml do not used for chat messages - spaces lost inside the strings.
Setting crash fixed (application package string variable set for every product flavor)
Chat scroll to bottom disabled if it was scrolled up manually.
